hadiths.text: Suhaib Al-Khair narrated that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“ Any Man who takes out a loan, having resolved not to pay it back, will meet Allah (SWT) as a thief.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ ادَّانَ دَيْنًا لَمْ يَنْوِ قَضَاءَهُ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Takes A Loan With No Intention Of Repaying It
